text: 13.2 Mat 17.20, 21.21, Mak 11.23, Luk 17.6, 1 Ko 12.8-10, 12.28 Pen yad bɨ God gos ñek agñeb olap mɨdɨl, God gos ne we gak ak mɨdupsek nɨgtep gɨl, gos tɨpagɨl ke yɨbɨl nɨŋɨd, Klays nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd, dum ogɨnap agen ke okok amonɨmuŋ ak pen, binɨb kɨlop mapen ma lenɨm, tap yokɨp yɨbɨl tek mɨdebin.
